## Description

<!-- Provide a clear description of your changes -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Test addition/update

## Related Issues

Closes #(issue number)
Related to #(issue number)

### Test Coverage

- [ ] Integration tests added/updated

- [ ] Test coverage maintained/improved

# How to test these changes

## Documentation

- [ ] Docstrings updated
- [ ] README.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] API.md updated (if API changed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] Type hints added/updated

## Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows style guide (`make lint` passes)
- [ ] Code formatted (`make format` run)
- [ ] No unnecessary comments or debug code
- [ ] No hardcoded values (use config instead)
- [ ] Error handling implemented

## Performance Impact

- [ ] No performance impact
- [ ] Performance improved
- [ ] Performance degraded (justified below)

**Benchmarks** (if applicable):
```
Before: ...
After: ...
```

## Screenshots

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Additional Notes

<!-- Any additional information reviewers should know -->

---

**For Reviewers:**

- [ ] Code quality and style
- [ ] Test coverage
- [ ] Documentation completeness
- [ ] Performance implications
- [ ] Breaking changes identified
